AUTHORITARIAN.Definition: demanding that people obey the rules (of a country, government)

CHAOS.Definition: a situation where there is no order and everything is confused

CONSPIRING.Definition: planning to do something in secret

CULT.Definition: very important to a small group of people

DEVOURING.Definition: reading in large quantities, literally 'eating quickly'

EXPOSÃ‰.Definition: a story in a newspaper that reveals the truth about something or someone

FACTIONS.Definition: small groups within a larger group

HERETICAL.Definition: a belief that is contrary to a particular religious belief

MERE.Definition: used to emphasise that something or someone is small and unimportant

PARODY.Definition: a piece of art (e.g. book, film) that copies something else in a funny way

RESURRECTION.Definition: when something is brought back to life

SOW.Definition: to do something that will cause a future action

SUPERIOR.Definition: the person above you in an organisation

UPTIGHT.Definition: strict and not willing to accept new ideas
